Hi Nic,

On 3/23/06, Nic <nferrier@...> wrote:
> > It make=
s a user hard to perform operations on the URI above, the
> > resource "is =
still there" after performing a HTTP DELETE method.
>
> I believe this is a=
n incorrect implementation of DELETE. The whole
> resource should have been=
 removed, not just the p3p file.

That's the point I'm trying to emphasis, =
sometimes we really need an
explicit pointer or URI to refer just the "p3p =
policy" in order to
perform operations.
